actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."questions" SET
    "number" = 1,
    "question" = '',
    "optiona" = '',
    "optionb" = '',
    "optionc" = '',
    "optiond" = '',
    "explanation" = '',
    "explanation_incorrect_a" = '',
    "correctoption" = '',
    "explanation_incorrect_b" = '',
    "explanation_incorrect_c" = '',
    "explanation_incorrect_d" = ''
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
